name: Solar System (itch) (CampLazlo)
description:
For my Solar System project I added Mercury, Venus, Mars, and Jupiter. I altered the colors for lighting, comet trail, and comet texture. I also adjusted the distances between planets and very roughly the scale so that they are more realistic. All planets rotate on their axis as well as around the sun, and have audio.

Created by Lillian Marsh for CAS 117

2021
